opposing.translation[0].definitions[0].d: opposing teams, groups, or forces are competing, arguing, or fighting against each other
opposing.translation[0].definitions[0].e: The opposing armies were preparing for war.
The Socialist Party has split into two opposing camps.
opposing.translation[0].definitions[1].d: opposing ideas, opinions etc are completely different from each other
opposing.translation[0].definitions[1].e: Throughout the negotiations Hurst and Jevons took opposing views.
